text: Bilgram-Mallanwan is a constituency of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly covering the city of Bilgram & Mallanwan in the Hardoi district of Uttar Pradesh, India. Bilgram-Mallanwan is one of five assembly constituencies in the Misrikh (Lok Sabha constituency) Since 2008, this assembly constituency is numbered 159 amongst 403 constituencies. Currently this seat belongs to Bharatiya Janata Party candidate Ashish Kumar Singh who won in last Assembly election of 2017 Uttar Pradesh Lagislative Elections defeating Samajwadi Party candidate Subhash Pal by a margin of 8,025 votes. ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Uttar Pradesh Category:Politics of Hardoi district
title: Bilgram-Mallanwan (Assembly constituency)
